alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry; Ionia; Kalamazoo; Kent; Muskegon; Ottawa; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 9:25PM EST until January 14 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow, heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches but localized amounts of up to one foot possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest and west central Michigan. * WHEN...Until noon EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel may become difficult. Roads may become impassable where the heaviest bands of snow set up. The combination of falling and blowing snow may lead to localized whiteout conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will continue to intensify overnight. Intense snow bands are expected to becoming oriented near the I- 96 corridor between Muskegon and Lansing. Snowfall rates will likely top an inch per hour within any stronger bands Wind chill temperatures will fall to zero to 10 below tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Allegan; Barry; Ionia; Kalamazoo; Kent; Muskegon; Ottawa; Van Buren
